LABEL: 0x323
STRING: Her words felt predictable.

LABEL: 0x353
STRING: Surely, this time we would be saved.

LABEL: 0x37F
STRING: There was no doubt we'd be able to escape.

LABEL: 0x3AD
STRING: That was how it was supposed to be.

LABEL: 0x3D9
STRING: But, there was no way things would go that well.

LABEL: 0x403
STRING: It must be too late now.

LABEL: 0x42D
STRING: I guess deep down in my heart, I couldn't wipe out such thoughts.

LABEL: 0x471
STRING: Yukari couldn't notice my inner despair and spoke quietly.

LABEL: 0x52D
STRING: 「Let me confirm one thing.」

LABEL: 0x555
STRING: 「Are you two... hurt?」

LABEL: 0x594
STRING: She asked us a sudden question.

LABEL: 0x5AE
STRING: Hurt?

LABEL: 0x5C8
STRING: I thought for a moment.

LABEL: 0x5E6
STRING: 「Ah... not really.」

LABEL: 0x614
STRING: The spot where Touri had hit me still hurt a little, and there were other places where I'd been hit too, but fortunately, there were no external injuries.

LABEL: 0x674
STRING: Tokiwa nodded her head next to me.

LABEL: 0x6AF
STRING: 「I'm fine too.」

LABEL: 0x6E3
STRING: 「Cervantes.」

LABEL: 0x706
STRING: She stated with a serious yet unsure expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x742
STRING: Yukari looked at both of us slowly.

LABEL: 0x7FD
STRING: 「...I see.」

LABEL: 0x87A
STRING: 「If that's the case, then I'm glad.」

LABEL: 0x8A9
STRING: Eventually, she took a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x8CF
STRING: She did look relieved, but...

LABEL: 0x901
STRING: Why?

LABEL: 0x917
STRING: Why had she asked if we were hurt suddenly?

LABEL: 0x951
STRING: 「What...」

LABEL: 0x971
STRING: 「What's going on?」

LABEL: 0xA1C
STRING: Yukari remained silent.

LABEL: 0xA3C
STRING: She was fidgeting and clasping her hands together while opening and closing her mouth. It seemed like she was having difficulty finding the words.

LABEL: 0xA92
STRING: Was she choosing her words carefully? Was she unsure where to start?

LABEL: 0xADA
STRING: Yukari took another deep breath and――

LABEL: 0xB76
STRING: 「I have bad news.」

LABEL: 0xBE0
STRING: 「I'll tell you in order, so please listen carefully.」

LABEL: 0xC21
STRING: With that preface, she slowly began to explain with a distant look in her eyes.

LABEL: 0xC74
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, as I'm sure you're aware, I've been trying to figure out whether or not I can pilot the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0xCDE
STRING: 「But... I got cold, making it hard to continue, so I left the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0xD3C
STRING: 「After that, I went to the warehouse downstairs to get a blanket, but there...」

LABEL: 0xDE5
STRING: 「――Someone slashed me from behind.」

LABEL: 0xE60
STRING: She was slashed?

LABEL: 0xE84
STRING: I thought back to the man who had been attacked by the light and died.

LABEL: 0xEBC
STRING: Were there still other enemies on board the <SHEEP III>?

LABEL: 0xEFD
STRING: Unknown ones at that――

LABEL: 0xF21
STRING: 「H-Hey.」

LABEL: 0xF3B
STRING: 「What do you mean, "someone?"」

LABEL: 0xF69
STRING: 「Is there someone still obstructing us――」

LABEL: 0xFA6
STRING: 「I didn't expect it either.」

LABEL: 0xFE4
STRING: 「Seriously... why...?」

LABEL: 0x102B
STRING: Yukari's voice trembled.

LABEL: 0x1069
STRING: They were words of regret.

LABEL: 0x108B
STRING: As the chief attendant protecting the <SHEEP III>, and as an adult, was she worried about this situation where obstacles kept appearing one after another?

LABEL: 0x10F2
STRING: She hung her head, at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x1118
STRING: In exchange, Tokiwa, who had been listening quietly, opened her mouth as if realizing something.

LABEL: 0x1239
STRING: 「Were you injured...?」

LABEL: 0x12D1
STRING: 「――I sensed their presence in time, fortunately.」

LABEL: 0x1309
STRING: 「I avoided a direct hit.」

LABEL: 0x1330
STRING: 「A direct hit――」

LABEL: 0x136A
STRING: I noticed something as she said that.

LABEL: 0x138A
STRING: It was hard to see with her attendant's uniform, but on the right shoulder of the dark blue fabric...

LABEL: 0x13CA
STRING: There was an area that was darker than the others.

LABEL: 0x1478
STRING: 「It's just a scratch.」

LABEL: 0x14A2
STRING: 「――I was a bit dizzy with anemia.」

LABEL: 0x14E0
STRING: 「Normally... I would've been able to take them down, but I let them get away.」

LABEL: 0x1531
STRING: Just a scratch... That was outrageous.

LABEL: 0x1561
STRING: If it really was, Yukari wouldn't say anything to anyone.

LABEL: 0x15A5
STRING: In fact, she had not moved her right arm for a while now.

LABEL: 0x1647
STRING: 「...That's terrible.」

LABEL: 0x166F
STRING: 「Blades shouldn't be pointed at people...」

LABEL: 0x16E4
STRING: Tokiwa gripped the hem of her kimono tightly.

LABEL: 0x1710
STRING: Her lips were trembling and she looked like she was about to burst into tears.

LABEL: 0x1754
STRING: As she bit her lip, Yukari began to panic, looking rather apologetic.

LABEL: 0x179E
STRING: She only lost her cool for a moment, however, and smiled gently at Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x18BD
STRING: 「I'm fine, Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x18E9
STRING: 「I'm sorry for making you worry.」

LABEL: 0x1974
STRING: 「I didn't catch who the culprit was, unfortunately――」

LABEL: 0x19B5
STRING: 「You've got to be kidding me...」

LABEL: 0x1A05
STRING: What the hell...

LABEL: 0x1A1F
STRING: Why was she smiling?

LABEL: 0x1A45
STRING: I couldn't stop my words from spilling out.

LABEL: 0x1A73
STRING: 「You keep telling us not to act alone――」

LABEL: 0x1AB9
STRING: 「Cut the bullshit!」

LABEL: 0x1AD9
STRING: 「You're putting yourself in much more danger than any of us!」

LABEL: 0x1B09
STRING: 「You went and acted alone!」

LABEL: 0x1B47
STRING: 「You even made Tokiwa cry...」

LABEL: 0x1B6F
STRING: 「What if you weren't there when Touri-san came back?!」

LABEL: 0x1C6F
STRING: I let it all out.

LABEL: 0x1C95
STRING: My thoughts.

LABEL: 0x1CA9
STRING: She was the one who had done the most to get us out of this ship.

LABEL: 0x1CF2
STRING: So why...?

LABEL: 0x1D0C
STRING: Yukari... and Hiragino too...

LABEL: 0x1D2C
STRING: They both said that they wanted to save everyone, so why were they getting themselves hurt like this?

LABEL: 0x1DF0
STRING: 「I understand what you're trying to say.」

LABEL: 0x1E24
STRING: 「...And I do think you're right.」

LABEL: 0x1EDB
STRING: 「But, let's save that discussion for later.」

LABEL: 0x1F05
STRING: 「There's something more important right now.」

LABEL: 0x1F3E
STRING: "Something more important," huh?

LABEL: 0x1F66
STRING: I was still concerned about how little she thought of her condition...

LABEL: 0x1FB6
STRING: 「If that wasn't the bad news...」

LABEL: 0x1FF6
STRING: 「Then what the hell's happened?」

LABEL: 0x20AB
STRING: She caught her breath.

LABEL: 0x20C7
STRING: The wound on her shoulder must be deep since she looked like she was in pain just from talking to us.

LABEL: 0x213F
STRING: Yukari's shoulders heaved, but her expression didn't change as she began to speak.

LABEL: 0x21F7
STRING: 「After that, I grabbed the blanket and returned to the emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x223B
STRING: 「I went to the rescue ship from there, but――」

LABEL: 0x2273
STRING: 「――Escape is no longer possible.」

LABEL: 0x22D5
STRING: 「...Did the rescue ship break down?」

LABEL: 0x236D
STRING: 「It seems that way.」

LABEL: 0x2392
STRING: Yukari was being evasive.

LABEL: 0x23B0
STRING: She didn't try to make eye contact. Instead, she was staring at her hands.

LABEL: 0x23EE
STRING: She looked away awkwardly.

LABEL: 0x2488
STRING: 「――I sealed off the pressurization room for now.」

LABEL: 0x24C6
STRING: 「Please... stay away from there.」

LABEL: 0x255F
STRING: 「No matter what happens.」

LABEL: 0x258E
STRING: 「We will.」

LABEL: 0x25C9
STRING: Tokiwa nodded her head in agreement.

LABEL: 0x25ED
STRING: Seeing that, Yukari looked relieved.

LABEL: 0x2617
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x262F
STRING: 「――What are you hiding?」

LABEL: 0x26C5
STRING: 「Hiding?」

LABEL: 0x26E8
STRING: Yukari's words were clearly strange.

LABEL: 0x271C
STRING: She might be telling the truth.

LABEL: 0x2746
STRING: However, she wasn't telling us everything.

LABEL: 0x2768
STRING: She hadn't presented any reasons as to how she came to her conclusion.

LABEL: 0x27B4
STRING: There was no point in arguing with each other in this situation,

LABEL: 0x27F2
STRING: but it was precisely because of our situation that I couldn't take unclear information at face value.

LABEL: 0x2840
STRING: I had to point it out.

LABEL: 0x2862
STRING: 「Blocking entry all of a sudden...」

LABEL: 0x288A
STRING: 「The rescue ship being broken...」

LABEL: 0x28B0
STRING: 「There's no way I'd accept something like that out of the blue.」

LABEL: 0x2979
STRING: 「I don't get it...」

LABEL: 0x299F
STRING: 「I don't know what happened, or who did what.」

LABEL: 0x29D7
STRING: 「Could you explain it in detail?」

LABEL: 0x2A03
STRING: ...This was a gamble.

LABEL: 0x2A29
STRING: Was Yukari hiding something or not?

LABEL: 0x2A5D
STRING: Was she really on our side or not?

LABEL: 0x2B32
STRING: Silence.

LABEL: 0x2B4C
STRING: Why didn't she say anything?

LABEL: 0x2B72
STRING: She wouldn't speak.

LABEL: 0x2B98
STRING: Yukari――

LABEL: 0x2C18
STRING: 「"Who did what?"――」

LABEL: 0x2CE9
STRING: We're about to find out, aren't we?」

LABEL: 0x2D37
STRING: 「If you confess――」

LABEL: 0x2D74
STRING: Then, Yukari moved her right hand, which had been still until now.

LABEL: 0x2DC2
STRING: Emerging from behind her was...

LABEL: 0x2DE4
STRING: An imposing shadow.

LABEL: 0x2E38
STRING: It was a speargun...

LABEL: 0x2E54
STRING: A long and narrow underwater gun.

LABEL: 0x2E70
STRING: She sluggishly lowered her right arm and didn't move.

LABEL: 0x2EAA
STRING: Was she hiding that thing behind her back?

LABEL: 0x2EDC
STRING: 「When did you...?」

LABEL: 0x2F0A
STRING: As I tried to get closer, she pointed the speargun at me.

LABEL: 0x2F48
STRING: The sharp tip of the harpoon was thrust before my eyes.

LABEL: 0x3008
STRING: 「――Stay away from me.」

LABEL: 0x3037
STRING: Her stare was cold.

LABEL: 0x3055
STRING: I glanced at the pointed tip of the harpoon.

LABEL: 0x306D
STRING: 「Why?!」

LABEL: 0x3098
STRING: 「Someone's obstructing our actions here on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x30CA
STRING: 「Which means I have to deal with that, too.」

LABEL: 0x310D
STRING: Yukari's eyes were deadly serious as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x313B
STRING: Her right hand trembled as she held the heavy speargun pointed in my direction...

LABEL: 0x318B
STRING: The wound on her shoulder was real.

LABEL: 0x31AD
STRING: She was unmistakably hurt.

LABEL: 0x31D7
STRING: The reason she didn't move her right arm wasn't just because she was hiding that spear gun.

LABEL: 0x3235
STRING: Why...?

LABEL: 0x324F
STRING: Why did she have to point it at us...?

LABEL: 0x333C
STRING: 「This isn't good, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x336C
STRING: 「Please put that dangerous thing down.」

LABEL: 0x339D
STRING: Whether she understood what was happening or not, I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x33CF
STRING: Tokiwa tried to persuade Yukari without seeming to be in a great hurry.

LABEL: 0x3415
STRING: Yukari glared at her sharply and pointed the speargun at her.

LABEL: 0x3459
STRING: Tokiwa's expression, however, remained the same.

LABEL: 0x34A2
STRING: 「You can't, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x3512
STRING: Yukari's eyes wavered.

LABEL: 0x3541
STRING: 「――I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x3563
STRING: 「I believe the two of you...」

LABEL: 0x3593
STRING: 「No, I want to believe.」

LABEL: 0x35EB
STRING: 「That's why.」

LABEL: 0x3612
STRING: As if to suppress her wavering feelings, Yukari finally made a strong declaration.

LABEL: 0x3665
STRING: 「Please stay right here.」

LABEL: 0x3693
STRING: 「I'll take care of everything.」

LABEL: 0x36BF
STRING: 「That's the only duty I have left――」

LABEL: 0x36FE
STRING: 「Why?!」

LABEL: 0x371A
STRING: 「Why are you trying to shoulder everything all by yourself?!」

LABEL: 0x3764
STRING: She pointed the speargun at me again as I shouted.

LABEL: 0x3798
STRING: I wasn't as scared of that weapon anymore.

LABEL: 0x37D2
STRING: Yukari smiled contently as I stared resolutely back at her.

LABEL: 0x3825
STRING: 「Don't shoulder everything by yourself...」

LABEL: 0x384F
STRING: 「I feel like I've said something like that to you before.」

LABEL: 0x3897
STRING: 「We may be similar in some ways.」

LABEL: 0x390D
STRING: 「Let me say one thing.」

LABEL: 0x393F
STRING: 「My actions aren't out of a sense of justice.」

LABEL: 0x396F
STRING: 「Duty, which I mentioned earlier, is one half, but the other half...」

LABEL: 0x39BB
STRING: 「The main reason is, above all, because it's rational.」

LABEL: 0x39FA
STRING: Yukari's eyes.

LABEL: 0x3A14
STRING: Determination dwelled within.

LABEL: 0x3A30
STRING: A tragic resolve to end it all by herself.

LABEL: 0x3A85
STRING: 「You can't trust anyone anymore.」

LABEL: 0x3AB1
STRING: 「You should consider everyone, myself included, an enemy.」

LABEL: 0x3AF4
STRING: 「What...?」

LABEL: 0x3B1F
STRING: 「――You two need to escape.」

LABEL: 0x3B47
STRING: 「No matter who you run into, you must not approach them.」

LABEL: 0x3BDF
STRING: Yukari turned on her heel.

LABEL: 0x3BF9
STRING: She left the theater room, dragging the heavy gun in her hand behind her.

LABEL: 0x3C45
STRING: 「Wait!」

LABEL: 0x3C5D
STRING: 「Yukari-san, the saboteur you encountered――」

LABEL: 0x3C9D
STRING: There were only a few survivors to begin with.

LABEL: 0x3CCD
STRING: To take Yukari's earlier statement, there was no unknown entity hiding from us on board the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x3D48
STRING: If that was true, then as much as I hated to think about it,

LABEL: 0x3D72
STRING: the person she was alluding to was――

LABEL: 0x3DA9
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x3E25
STRING: Yukari looked back at me.

LABEL: 0x3E41
STRING: There was a sad smile on her face.

LABEL: 0x3E79
STRING: Her expression told me everything.

LABEL: 0x3EB6
STRING: 「――Don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x3EDA
STRING: 「I'm sure you two will get out of here alive.」

LABEL: 0x3F35
STRING: With that, she disappeared into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x3F71
STRING: 「Wait――!」

LABEL: 0x3F99
STRING: I rushed toward the door――

LABEL: 0x406C
STRING: There was a violent sound, as if something had exploded.

LABEL: 0x409C
STRING: I felt an intense vibration on my hand as I held it to the door.

LABEL: 0x40CE
STRING: I looked down.

LABEL: 0x40F8
STRING: A silver arrowhead protruded from the door.

LABEL: 0x4128
STRING: It was from the speargun that Yukari had been pointing at me and Tokiwa just a moment ago.

LABEL: 0x4174
STRING: "Don't follow me any further."

LABEL: 0x4194
STRING: "The next time we meet――"

LABEL: 0x41BC
STRING: That was her wordless message.

LABEL: 0x41DC
STRING: It didn't just pierce the door, but my heart as well.

LABEL: 0x4214
STRING: This was a clear rejection.

LABEL: 0x4236
STRING: Her obstinate will, coated in kindness.

LABEL: 0x426C
STRING: My hand slid down the door.

LABEL: 0x4292
STRING: My fingertips touched the silver tip, passed it,

LABEL: 0x42C0
STRING: and before I knew it, I was crouching down on the floor.

LABEL: 0x4326
STRING: 「Why's this happening?!」

LABEL: 0x435E
STRING: The overwhelming rejection of Yukari.

LABEL: 0x437E
STRING: She was telling me it didn't matter what my will was.

LABEL: 0x43B6
STRING: She had left carrying a duty and the strength to achieve it.

LABEL: 0x4402
STRING: The only one left behind was me, who could do nothing.

LABEL: 0x4438
STRING: 「Why――」

LABEL: 0x44B3
STRING: Why did all these painful things keep happening?

LABEL: 0x44E5
STRING: Why wouldn't things go the way I wanted them to?

LABEL: 0x4515
STRING: Why were there only more victims?

LABEL: 0x454B
STRING: Why was I――

LABEL: 0x456D
STRING: 「Why am I so useless?」

LABEL: 0x4662
STRING: I wanted to save everyone, too.

LABEL: 0x4750
STRING: I didn't want to lose anyone, either.

LABEL: 0x483E
STRING: If I could have fought back with a gun, I would have.

LABEL: 0x4878
STRING: Seeking salvation, scrambling for it,

LABEL: 0x48AC
STRING: I was chasing after the single ray of light that I finally caught.

LABEL: 0x4957
STRING: And each time, I was betrayed.

LABEL: 0x497D
STRING: Just when I thought we had made contact, we were cut off.

LABEL: 0x49AF
STRING: Just when I thought the rescue team had arrived, someone attacked us.

LABEL: 0x49E3
STRING: Just when I thought we'd be able to escape on that rescue ship――

LABEL: 0x4A24
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x4AA0
STRING: I looked up.

LABEL: 0x4ABA
STRING: When I did, I saw Tokiwa's clothes rustling in front of me.

LABEL: 0x4AF4
STRING: She was just standing there, looking down at me.

LABEL: 0x4BA0
STRING: 「...You look depressed.」

LABEL: 0x4BD1
STRING: 「I can't... take it anymore.」

LABEL: 0x4BF1
STRING: 「Leave me alone.」

LABEL: 0x4C13
STRING: I can't do anything.

LABEL: 0x4C2F
STRING: I couldn't do anything.

LABEL: 0x4C4F
STRING: I couldn't save anyone.

LABEL: 0x4C6F
STRING: 「I'm powerless...」

LABEL: 0x4CDB
STRING: I didn't even have the energy for repentance.

LABEL: 0x4D07
STRING: I buried my face in my knees,

LABEL: 0x4D43
STRING: full of regret for all the things that were now too late.

LABEL: 0x4D6D
STRING: There was nothing more I could do...

LABEL: 0x4DAC
STRING: 「Do you know about this experiment?」

LABEL: 0x4DDD
STRING: Abruptly.

LABEL: 0x4DF3
STRING: Tokiwa, who was looking down at me as I despaired, opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x4EA3
STRING: 「It was an experiment with dogs.」

LABEL: 0x4EC7
STRING: 「They would make the dogs listen to a high-pitched sound and then send an electric shock to the floor of the room in which the dogs were in.」

LABEL: 0x4F2D
STRING: 「There was another room next to that one with no shocks there.」

LABEL: 0x4FE6
STRING: 「――Now then, what do you think happened to the dogs as a result of this continuous experiment?」

LABEL: 0x5031
STRING: What happened...?

LABEL: 0x5051
STRING: They would prepare an escape route.

LABEL: 0x5071
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x508D
STRING: 「Did they start running to the room next to them as soon as they heard the sound?」

LABEL: 0x513D
STRING: 「Exactly. It was a form of operant conditioning.」

LABEL: 0x517B
STRING: 「The dogs learned that an electric shock would follow the sound and were able to escape successfully.」

LABEL: 0x51EC
STRING: Familiarity with repeated events was a form of learning.

LABEL: 0x5230
STRING: I wondered what Tokiwa was trying to tell me.

LABEL: 0x52D6
STRING: 「They then tried the same experiment, this time with a different group of dogs.」

LABEL: 0x531A
STRING: 「The dogs were put into a room with electric shocks on the floor before the experiment was conducted.」

LABEL: 0x5384
STRING: 「They would shock them in that room. There was no other room, so there was no way to escape...」

LABEL: 0x53F6
STRING: 「And so, when the dogs who had experienced this "electric shock room" beforehand performed the experiment I explained earlier――」

LABEL: 0x545A
STRING: 「No matter how many times they heard the sound, they wouldn't run away.」

LABEL: 0x54A0
STRING: 「They quietly endured it and waited for the electric shocks to end. Why do you think that was?」

LABEL: 0x5507
STRING: Despite knowing the agony and pain of the electric shocks beforehand, they didn't try to run away from them.

LABEL: 0x555F
STRING: Why...?

LABEL: 0x5577
STRING: 「...Maybe they got used to the shocks or something.」

LABEL: 0x5613
STRING: 「No, that's not it.」

LABEL: 0x562D
STRING: 「No matter how much you get used to it, you don't want to experience something you don't like.」

LABEL: 0x5667
STRING: 「For example, if you get shocked 100 times, will the 101st be fine for you because you're used to it?」

LABEL: 0x56D1
STRING: 「Changes in the body's structure don't happen in such a short period of time.」

LABEL: 0x5718
STRING: If they didn't get used to it and their bodies didn't change, then――

LABEL: 0x57CE
STRING: 「――That was also a form of learning.」

LABEL: 0x57F8
STRING: 「The dogs learned something in the room where they were given electric shocks.」

LABEL: 0x5840
STRING: 「Namely, that "these shocks are something I can't escape from no matter what."」

LABEL: 0x58BB
STRING: "Learned powerlessness"――

LABEL: 0x58E1
STRING: I'd heard about it before.

LABEL: 0x590B
STRING: You "learned" that you were powerless. That you had no power and were unable to even make an effort to change your situation...

LABEL: 0x5994
STRING: 「Even when the situation actually allowed them to escape...」

LABEL: 0x59D0
STRING: 「Even if they were given a sound, a clue as to how to escape...」

LABEL: 0x5A0E
STRING: 「The dogs gave up from the start.」

LABEL: 0x5A97
STRING: 「How, then, could the dogs escape?」

LABEL: 0x5AE2
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x5B00
STRING: That was easy.

LABEL: 0x5B16
STRING: ――Get up as many times as it takes.

LABEL: 0x5B42
STRING: Foolishly, honestly, and without giving up.

LABEL: 0x5B6A
STRING: Just doing that was enough...

LABEL: 0x5BAE
STRING: ――That's right.

LABEL: 0x5BC8
STRING: That was all I needed to do.

LABEL: 0x5BF0
STRING: This wasn't the time to despair.

LABEL: 0x5C1C
STRING: I looked up vigorously.

LABEL: 0x5CA1
STRING: As I did, I saw Tokiwa looking down at me and tilting her head.

LABEL: 0x5CE7
STRING: 「...Thank you, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x5D7B
STRING: 「It was nothing.」

LABEL: 0x5D95
STRING: 「You were like the very picture of depression, so I only tried to cheer you up accordingly.」

LABEL: 0x5DFC
STRING: According to the clock embedded in the wall, the time was already ten o'clock.

LABEL: 0x5E44
STRING: I... must not give up.

LABEL: 0x5E6E
STRING: What was it that I wanted?

LABEL: 0x5E8C
STRING: What could I do to achieve that goal?

LABEL: 0x5EBC
STRING: If I didn't have the power to change the situation in one blow, I had to do it bit by bit.

LABEL: 0x5F6F
STRING: 「Tokiwa, I...」

LABEL: 0x5F91
STRING: 「...I think we have to stop her.」

LABEL: 0x6035
STRING: 「I agree.」

LABEL: 0x604F
STRING: 「No matter what...」

LABEL: 0x6071
STRING: 「Taking a life is unforgivable.」

LABEL: 0x60AA
STRING: Tokiwa clenches her fists.

LABEL: 0x60F0
STRING: 「――Give me your hand, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x611C
STRING: 「At this rate...」

LABEL: 0x613E
STRING: 「Yukari-san will kill Touri.」

LABEL: 0x626D
STRING: We dashed out into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x628B
STRING: Yukari was already gone.

LABEL: 0x62AB
STRING: I wouldn't run away anymore.

LABEL: 0x62C9
STRING: From Yukari, or――

LABEL: 0x6348
STRING: ――Come to think of it, there was only one person.

LABEL: 0x637A
STRING: This "someone" who had attacked Yukari, and the culprit who damaged the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x63BA
STRING: And, most likely, they were the one who broke the communication equipment in the wheelhouse as well...

LABEL: 0x63F4
STRING: The number of survivors were limited to begin with.

LABEL: 0x6483
STRING: Tokiwa and I were here.

LABEL: 0x65CC
STRING: Other than us, there were only Yukari, Hiragino, and Touri.

LABEL: 0x65FC
STRING: Thinking of someone besides us was just running away.

LABEL: 0x6683
STRING: We had been through a lot together up until now.

LABEL: 0x66B1
STRING: The five survivors, excluding Reiri...

LABEL: 0x66DA
STRING: Who among us was able to destroy the communication equipment in the wheelhouse...?

LABEL: 0x6791
STRING: It was a simple process of elimination.

LABEL: 0x67AD
STRING: Why had she done it?

LABEL: 0x67D5
STRING: Did she have no choice?

LABEL: 0x67FF
STRING: How she actually destroyed the communication equipment and rescue ship, I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x6859
STRING: I didn't know... but there was no other possibility.

LABEL: 0x68A6
STRING: ――Only Touri could have done it.

LABEL: 0x68D2
STRING: I had no idea what kind of motive she had...

LABEL: 0x6918
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x6930
STRING: I put my hand to my forehead.

LABEL: 0x6A0E
STRING: The spot where she had hit me hurt.

LABEL: 0x6A36
STRING: If she had lost her sense of reason after losing Reiri... it was not unthinkable.

LABEL: 0x6A80
STRING: And, she wasn't the only one losing themselves in this situation.

LABEL: 0x6ACC
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x6AE8
STRING: The wounded chief attendant carrying a speargun.

LABEL: 0x6B1E
STRING: She was supposed to know more about the <SHEEP III> than anyone else.

LABEL: 0x6B5D
STRING: To think that she, who had fought harder than anyone to escape and to survive,

LABEL: 0x6B9F
STRING: would try to kill her own friend... I didn't know what to think of that.

LABEL: 0x6C51
STRING: 「Are you in pain?」

LABEL: 0x6C9D
STRING: 「It'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x6D18
STRING: 「I'm in good health too.」

LABEL: 0x6D41
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x6D5B
STRING: She seemed to be doing well.

LABEL: 0x6D7D
STRING: Fickle as usual, she was making no attempt to read the mood.

LABEL: 0x6DC3
STRING: But she was smart, so she must be aware of the urgency of this situation.

LABEL: 0x6E1B
STRING: There was something reassuring about her presence.

LABEL: 0x6EBD
STRING: 「Oh, come to think of it, there's that creature too.」

LABEL: 0x6EF9
STRING: 「The light.」

LABEL: 0x6F11
STRING: 「We better watch out.」

LABEL: 0x6F5C
STRING: ――I didn't know how many of these hide-and-seek games I'd played on this ship so far...

LABEL: 0x6FA0
STRING: But this would be the last time.

LABEL: 0x6FC0
STRING: That was the feeling I had.

LABEL: 0x6FE0
STRING: But... the rules were different this time.

LABEL: 0x7014
STRING: Whether we

LABEL: 0x702E
STRING: were doing the chasing,

LABEL: 0x7050
STRING: or were the ones being chased,

LABEL: 0x7074
STRING: I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x7199
STRING: The next time we would meet Yukari and Touri might not be on friendly terms.

LABEL: 0x71D1
STRING: Both of them were carrying some kind of a weapon.

LABEL: 0x7205
STRING: The conditions for success were very limited.

LABEL: 0x7231
STRING: We had to find Yukari and Touri before they started killing each other.

LABEL: 0x728F
STRING: Moreover, if they found us first, there would be no way to resist.

LABEL: 0x72DB
STRING: We had to find them before they found us and convince them as quickly as possible――

LABEL: 0x7363
STRING: 「This is...」

LABEL: 0x73DC
STRING: We were in front of the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x73F6
STRING: I suddenly stopped in front of the closed door.

LABEL: 0x7428
STRING: ――On the other side was the broken rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x745C
STRING: I would like to confirm just how Yukari had sealed it off, but...

LABEL: 0x751E
STRING: 「What are you doing?」

LABEL: 0x754B
STRING: 「Well, in there...」

LABEL: 0x75DB
STRING: 「Ah, I certainly am curious about the rescue ship as well.」

LABEL: 0x760F
STRING: 「But right now, our priority is to stop Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x7650
STRING: 「Yeah... You're right.」

LABEL: 0x7672
STRING: If we didn't do something about her, we wouldn't be able to find out what the situation with the rescue ship was.

LABEL: 0x76D4
STRING: 「...Let's talk to Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x7704
STRING: 「I'm sure he doesn't know anything about what's happening.」

LABEL: 0x7730
STRING: We needed to tell him about this current situation.

LABEL: 0x7760
STRING: We were racing against time for sure, but we had to let him know...

LABEL: 0x780F
STRING: We entered the familiar emergency room.

LABEL: 0x782D
STRING: The lights were turned off like before...

LABEL: 0x7873
STRING: 「Hiragino-san――」

LABEL: 0x78A0
STRING: 「Oh, Sousuke-san.」

LABEL: 0x7922
STRING: Hiragino was still sleeping on the bed in the emergency room, concealed behind milky-white curtains.

LABEL: 0x79A6
STRING: His breathing was peaceful.

LABEL: 0x79C2
STRING: He must have been really tired... Come to think of it, Yukari did say she gave him some medicine.

LABEL: 0x7A12
STRING: It might not be a good idea to force him awake.

LABEL: 0x7A4E
STRING: If only I could leave a message somehow...

LABEL: 0x7AEB
STRING: With that, my gaze surveying the room naturally stopped on the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x7B25
STRING: Yukari had said that she'd sealed it, and it was indeed locked.

LABEL: 0x7B69
STRING: However, even if it was, I still had my counterfeit master key.

LABEL: 0x7BBD
STRING: Yukari should know that if I wanted to open it, it would be no trouble at all.

LABEL: 0x7C17
STRING: Why did she do something so pointless?

LABEL: 0x7C45
STRING: I didn't know what her intentions were.

LABEL: 0x7C75
STRING: Was this some kind of message?

LABEL: 0x7CA3
STRING: Or did she simply forget?

LABEL: 0x7CD5
STRING: I walked in front of the door of the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x7CF3
STRING: As I stood there, someone tugged on my sleeve from behind.

LABEL: 0x7DFC
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x7E16
STRING: 「Shall we go? We need to find Yukari-san first.」

LABEL: 0x7E55
STRING: Tokiwa tilted her head with an anxious look on her face and, as if compelled, I turned around toward the hallway.

LABEL: 0x7ECD
STRING: There was no time.

LABEL: 0x7EE7
STRING: This wasn't the time to be distracted by uncertain information.

LABEL: 0x7F2F
STRING: I knew that, but――

LABEL: 0x7F6A
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x7F8B
STRING: Tokiwa looked at me suspiciously.

LABEL: 0x7FAB
STRING: It was no wonder.

LABEL: 0x7FC5
STRING: My legs didn't move.

LABEL: 0x7FE5
STRING: I looked back at the pressurization room again.

LABEL: 0x800D
STRING: 「I'm sorry, I know every second counts.」

LABEL: 0x8049
STRING: 「...I just have a bad feeling about this.」

LABEL: 0x80D9
STRING: 「...Intuition should not be underestimated.」

LABEL: 0x8107
STRING: 「Now that that's decided, open sesame!」

LABEL: 0x8151
STRING: She pushed me from behind and I unlocked the door.

LABEL: 0x817F
STRING: The light electronic sound felt resentful.

LABEL: 0x8222
STRING: I opened the door and stepped inside.

LABEL: 0x8244
STRING: There was nothing out of the ordinary inside the room itself.

LABEL: 0x8276
STRING: Beyond it was a closed hatch.

LABEL: 0x82A4
STRING: It was the door leading to the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x82C6
STRING: 「On the other side――」

LABEL: 0x82E4
STRING: What kind of a situation awaited us?

LABEL: 0x83DD
STRING: Yukari hadn't told us anything.

LABEL: 0x83FF
STRING: She had just evaded the subject and told us not to go in.

LABEL: 0x84C0
STRING: However...

LABEL: 0x84D8
STRING: ...It was pointless to think about it now.

LABEL: 0x8502
STRING: Whatever awaited us, we had to face it.

LABEL: 0x853C
STRING: We must not give up.

LABEL: 0x855C
STRING: I took a deep breath, then went straight to the door――

LABEL: 0x8596
STRING: ――It opened.

LABEL: 0x865F
STRING: The temperature inside was cold, as usual.

LABEL: 0x8685
STRING: A concentrated atmosphere hung in the air.

LABEL: 0x86A9
STRING: All power was turned off inside the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x86E5
STRING: The room had no artificial lights of any kind, including the control panels and displays.

LABEL: 0x872D
STRING: Despite that, the room was reasonably bright.

LABEL: 0x875F
STRING: Why?

LABEL: 0x8773
STRING: There was no need to think about it.

LABEL: 0x8793
STRING: Because there was light.

LABEL: 0x87B1
STRING: Yes, light――

LABEL: 0x888D
STRING: The strangely colored light.

LABEL: 0x88B7
STRING: 「――Watch out!」

LABEL: 0x88D5
STRING: I immediately grabbed Tokiwa's arm and pulled her toward me.

LABEL: 0x8911
STRING: Reiri had been enveloped by that light and――

LABEL: 0x893F
STRING: I shielded her behind my back.

LABEL: 0x89CD
STRING: If we just went back like this and closed the hatch...

LABEL: 0x8A4C
STRING: 「――Hold on a minute!」

LABEL: 0x8A7A
STRING: 「Something's... wrong.」

LABEL: 0x8AA5
STRING: 「Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0x8ABF
STRING: Twisting her body, she escaped my grasp.

LABEL: 0x8AFB
STRING: Tokiwa rushed into the rescue ship, passing through the hatch.

LABEL: 0x8BD7
STRING: 「Hey, it's dangerous!」

LABEL: 0x8C65
STRING: 「Why are the points of light distributed on the same plane?」

LABEL: 0x8CA7
STRING: 「I've never seen them move like this before... It's abnormal.」

LABEL: 0x8CD7
STRING: 「Why are they distributed like this...?」

LABEL: 0x8CFF
STRING: 「Rather than on a flat surface, they're――?」

LABEL: 0x8D4E
STRING: Tokiwa muttered to herself and kept changing her expression hectically.

LABEL: 0x8D9A
STRING: It was just like when she encountered that sunfish. She had lost sight of her surroundings.

LABEL: 0x8DE2
STRING: Her eyes kept darting around wildly.

LABEL: 0x8E12
STRING: I could tell just from looking that she was lost in thought.

LABEL: 0x8EA8
STRING: The voice leaking from her open mouth had no meaning.

LABEL: 0x8EE4
STRING: It was the heat of her thoughts overflowing without emotion.

LABEL: 0x8F10
STRING: She was staggering and unsteady on her feet――

LABEL: 0x8F4A
STRING: 「Hey, what are you thinking――」

LABEL: 0x8F74
STRING: 「Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0x90CD
STRING: 「Oh, it's Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x90F2
STRING: Tokiwa looked to have completely lost consciousness for a moment, but my voice seemed to have brought her back to her senses.

LABEL: 0x914A
STRING: 「Are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x91D0
STRING: 「Oh, ah, yes. I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0x9203
STRING: Tokiwa smiled at me.

LABEL: 0x9229
STRING: Good, seems like she's alright――

LABEL: 0x92B1
STRING: 「Yah!」

LABEL: 0x92D3
STRING: Out of nowhere, Tokiwa kicked the light.

LABEL: 0x9305
STRING: 「What the hell are you doing?!」

LABEL: 0x9397
STRING: 「That was a Tokki Kick.」

LABEL: 0x93C2
STRING: 「What? Are you an idiot?!」

LABEL: 0x945A
STRING: 「I expect my IQ to be quite remarkable.」

LABEL: 0x9493
STRING: 「That's not what I meant!」

LABEL: 0x9535
STRING: 「What do you think you're doing?」

LABEL: 0x9596
STRING: And in that moment――

LABEL: 0x9611
STRING: The light spread out... like it was bursting.

LABEL: 0x963B
STRING: It spread like scattered fireflies. Like flower petals fluttering in the air, filling up the flat surface.

LABEL: 0x9695
STRING: It was a fantastical scene.

LABEL: 0x96B1
STRING: The spreading light illuminated the entirety of the small rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x96E9
STRING: While staring at the dimly emerging light,

LABEL: 0x9717
STRING: my eyes were eventually drawn to its source.

LABEL: 0x973D
STRING: What had Tokiwa kicked in the first place?

LABEL: 0x976F
STRING: At the center of the gathering of light...

LABEL: 0x978B
STRING: On the floor...

LABEL: 0x97A1
STRING: Lying down there,

LABEL: 0x97BC
STRING: was Reiri's corpse.

LABEL: 0x98BB
STRING: A sob.

LABEL: 0x98CF
STRING: I felt like vomiting.

LABEL: 0x98E5
STRING: Dizziness.

LABEL: 0x98F9
STRING: Light.

LABEL: 0x990B
STRING: Writhing light.

LABEL: 0x9921
STRING: It was moving inside Reiri's body.

LABEL: 0x9961
STRING: The light filled her body, which had lost one arm.

LABEL: 0x9997
STRING: Mysterious repulsion.

LABEL: 0x99B9
STRING: The pale girl with no will, no consciousness, no life, emitted a green glow.

LABEL: 0x9A09
STRING: Why was Reiri's body glowing?

LABEL: 0x9A3D
STRING: Why was her corpse here?

LABEL: 0x9A79
STRING: She should have been down on the first floor.

LABEL: 0x9ABB
STRING: How in the world did this happen――

LABEL: 0x9BA7
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x9BCA
STRING: I heard Tokiwa's voice.

LABEL: 0x9BE4
STRING: She was no longer looking at Reiri.

LABEL: 0x9C14
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x9CA2
STRING: 「I now understand what Yukari-san meant.」

LABEL: 0x9CD8
STRING: 「This rescue ship is lost.」

LABEL: 0x9D99
STRING: 「Look.」

LABEL: 0x9DBA
STRING: Reiri was radiating light.

LABEL: 0x9DD6
STRING: It faintly illuminated the inner walls of the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x9E92
STRING: 「That's terrible...」

LABEL: 0x9EAC
STRING: The gauges were illuminated.

LABEL: 0x9ED0
STRING: They had all been destroyed.

LABEL: 0x9F08
STRING: Just like the communication equipment in the wheelhouse, it looked like they were struck with a blunt object.

LABEL: 0x9F5C
STRING: They had been broken to the point where you could tell at a glance that they couldn't be repaired.

LABEL: 0x9F9C
STRING: The destruction was so overwhelming that the idea of repairing the damage was unthinkable.

LABEL: 0xA086
STRING: 「This――」

LABEL: 0xA0B1
STRING: 「...Let's get out of here.」

LABEL: 0xA0D6
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0xA0F0
STRING: There was nothing more to say.

LABEL: 0xA11C
STRING: We left the rescue ship in silence.

LABEL: 0xA1BE
STRING: So that was why Yukari had been so evasive earlier.

LABEL: 0xA1F6
STRING: She had said nothing, and I now understood why she had sealed off the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0xA230
STRING: But... why had Reiri's body moved here?

LABEL: 0xA2F9
STRING: 「I feel like things are more serious than I thought.」

LABEL: 0xA34C
STRING: Tokiwa mumbled to herself.

LABEL: 0xA36E
STRING: I completely agreed.

LABEL: 0xA38A
STRING: Although, what Tokiwa was thinking about was probably a lot broader than me.

LABEL: 0xA3E4
STRING: But still... something serious was going on.

LABEL: 0xA428
STRING: Just before I closed the hatch――

LABEL: 0xA44C
STRING: For a moment, the light wavered, and then...

LABEL: 0xA46A
STRING: It almost looked like Reiri had moved.

LABEL: 0xA4AE
STRING: I closed the hatch completely.

LABEL: 0xA4CE
STRING: My hair was standing on end.

LABEL: 0xA4F0
STRING: This was something that should be locked away and never revealed.

LABEL: 0xA53A
STRING: As Yukari had said, it should be "sealed."

LABEL: 0xA57A
STRING: I'm sorry, Reiri――

LABEL: 0xA606
STRING: 「Yukari-san, Akari-chan, Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0xA638
STRING: 「The first thing we need to do is meet with all of them.」

LABEL: 0xA66B
STRING: A straightforward intent.

LABEL: 0xA689
STRING: Her words carried even more seriousness than before.

LABEL: 0xA6C9
STRING: Something had to be done to resolve this.

LABEL: 0xA6F9
STRING: We had to do something to make that happen ourselves.

LABEL: 0xA731
STRING: No, we had to possess a strong will to make it happen.

LABEL: 0xA77A
STRING: 「Let's go.」

LABEL: 0xA79D
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0xA7CD
STRING: We turned to exit the emergency room.

LABEL: 0xA7F1
STRING: At that moment――

LABEL: 0xA946
STRING: ――I dodged immediately.

LABEL: 0xA968
STRING: A flash of white light ran through the spot where I had been.

LABEL: 0xA9A2
STRING: I saw someone moving past me.

LABEL: 0xA9D2
STRING: Using my right foot as a pivot, I stood up and faced the shadow.

LABEL: 0xAA1C
STRING: It was a familiar face.

LABEL: 0xAA36
STRING: Sadly, just as I'd expected――

LABEL: 0xAADB
STRING: 「――Touri!」

LABEL: 0xAAF9
STRING: It had been a while since we last saw each other.

LABEL: 0xAB13
STRING: This wasn't the kind of situation for a moving reunion.

LABEL: 0xAB45
STRING: Facing her, she stood up slowly from her posture after swinging down her weapon.

LABEL: 0xABBF
STRING: There was a large kitchen knife in her right hand.

LABEL: 0xABE1
STRING: That was what we used to dissect the deep-sea fish...

LABEL: 0xAC13
STRING: Her left hand, hidden behind her, was hard to see, but she was grabbing something like a blunt weapon with it.

LABEL: 0xAC69
STRING: There was no light in her eyes... No.

LABEL: 0xAC91
STRING: ――A dark light dwelled within.

LABEL: 0xACC2
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0xAD0E
STRING: 「Give her back...」

LABEL: 0xAD2C
STRING: 「Give me back... Reiri...」

LABEL: 0xAD71
STRING: ――Did Touri know?

LABEL: 0xAD99
STRING: That Reiri was on the other side of that door.

LABEL: 0xADD1
STRING: She continued.

LABEL: 0xAE26
STRING: 「Give me the master key...」

LABEL: 0xAE50
STRING: 「I'm going to get out of here with her...」

LABEL: 0xAE86
STRING: 「The rescue ship... will work, won't it?」

LABEL: 0xAEB2
STRING: 「Why didn't you tell me...?」

LABEL: 0xAEE3
STRING: 「What are you talking about...?」

LABEL: 0xAF0B
STRING: The rescue ship had been completely broken.

LABEL: 0xAF31
STRING: That had to have been Touri's doing... What was she saying?

LABEL: 0xAF77
STRING: There was no way to escape anymore.

LABEL: 0xAFBF
STRING: And, Reiri was...

LABEL: 0xAFD7
STRING: 「Escape's not possible anymore.」

LABEL: 0xB067
STRING: 「What's not possible?」

LABEL: 0xB08E
STRING: Touri tilted her head.

LABEL: 0xB0AC
STRING: She didn't seem at all calculative.

LABEL: 0xB0D8
STRING: Her gesture was, in a way, innocent looking.

LABEL: 0xB127
STRING: 「I'm her big sister.」

LABEL: 0xB14D
STRING: 「I have to let Reiri live and bring her home.」

LABEL: 0xB18B
STRING: 「――If I don't, Mom will...」

LABEL: 0xB1FA
STRING: ...Mother?

LABEL: 0xB212
STRING: Why was she bringing up their mother right now?

LABEL: 0xB252
STRING: If I wasn't mistaken, she had already passed away...

LABEL: 0xB292
STRING: Why was she coming up at a time like this?

LABEL: 0xB2DF
STRING: 「Escape is impossible.」

LABEL: 0xB2FF
STRING: 「Both the rescue ship... and Reiri-chan are...」

LABEL: 0xB32D
STRING: 「Escaping is unimaginable in this state.」

LABEL: 0xB38E
STRING: 「Impossible? Why?」

LABEL: 0xB3B7
STRING: Touri repeated herself.

LABEL: 0xB3D3
STRING: They seemed to be having a conversation, but her eyes were not looking at Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0xB417
STRING: I was convinced.

LABEL: 0xB42F
STRING: ――At this moment,

LABEL: 0xB44F
STRING: she was not sane.

LABEL: 0xB47C
STRING: 「Hey, Reiri's in there, isn't she?」

LABEL: 0xB4AE
STRING: 「What are you trying to do by locking her up?」

LABEL: 0xB4EC
STRING: 「Oh, I need to give her some medicine...」

LABEL: 0xB510
STRING: 「She's out of medicine again――」

LABEL: 0xB543
STRING: When I looked, I saw that her pockets were bulging.

LABEL: 0xB57F
STRING: She must have packed every syringe and ampule of medicine she could find.

LABEL: 0xB5C9
STRING: Did she not feel that something was wrong with her at all...?

LABEL: 0xB622
STRING: 「Hey, so, Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0xB6A5
STRING: 「――Give me the key.」

LABEL: 0xB6CE
STRING: Displaying a small smile, Touri spoke in a carefree tone.

LABEL: 0xB706
STRING: Seeing her like that... hurt.

LABEL: 0xB72A
STRING: It would've been much better if she just gave in to her anger and yelled at me.

LABEL: 0xB7CF
STRING: And so.

LABEL: 0xB7E5
STRING: In the back of my mind, I recalled the image of Reiri from earlier.

LABEL: 0xB819
STRING: A repulsive monster-like form, emitting light from her entire body.

LABEL: 0xB8CC
STRING: ...I couldn't.

LABEL: 0xB8E6
STRING: There were some things you should see, and some things you shouldn't.

LABEL: 0xB918
STRING: For Touri right now, seeing that would be a fatal blow.

LABEL: 0xB944
STRING: I... didn't want to break her any further.

LABEL: 0xB972
STRING: I couldn't do something so cruel.

LABEL: 0xB99C
STRING: For Touri's sake.

LABEL: 0xBA85
STRING: 「Hey?」

LABEL: 0xBA9D
STRING: 「Open this door.」

LABEL: 0xBAC2
STRING: Repeating herself in the same tone, she inched closer, one step at a time.

LABEL: 0xBB70
STRING: 「Won't you open it for me?」

LABEL: 0xBB94
STRING: 「Even if it's Katagiri-san and Tokiwa-chan, I won't forgive you.」

LABEL: 0xBBD9
STRING: In here――

LABEL: 0xBBF1
STRING: It would be easy to overpower her.

LABEL: 0xBC1F
STRING: No matter how athletic Touri was, it didn't change the fact that she was a younger girl.

LABEL: 0xBC75
STRING: She may have a blade, but――

LABEL: 0xBC9F
STRING: I should be able to hold her back easily... I think.

LABEL: 0xBCED
STRING: But, the problem was...

LABEL: 0xBD0D
STRING: If I hurt her by being careless――

LABEL: 0xBD5D
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0xBD80
STRING: Tokiwa whispered to my ear from behind me.

LABEL: 0xBE1E
STRING: 「Can you leave this to me?」

LABEL: 0xBE5D
STRING: 「To you?」

LABEL: 0xBEE9
STRING: 「Yes, I'll take care of it.」

LABEL: 0xBF12
STRING: I was worried about her whispers, but she seemed awfully confident...

LABEL: 0xBF6C
STRING: However, it wasn't like I had any other choice right now.

LABEL: 0xC010
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, quickly, the key...」

LABEL: 0xC03F
STRING: 「...All right, I'm counting on you.」

LABEL: 0xC079
STRING: Instantly.

LABEL: 0xC08D
STRING: Tokiwa kicked me in the back.

LABEL: 0xC12A
STRING: 「Buhaa!」

LABEL: 0xC146
STRING: She kicked me with all her might. I lost my support and began freefalling.

LABEL: 0xC192
STRING: I fell straight toward Touri.

LABEL: 0xC1D1
STRING: 「Kyaah!」

LABEL: 0xC1F0
STRING: It was so sudden that she jumped back in fear.

LABEL: 0xC232
STRING: I rolled over and regained my footing by the door.

LABEL: 0xC278
STRING: 「Tokiwa, your hand!」

LABEL: 0xC298
STRING: I grabbed Tokiwa's outstretched arm.

LABEL: 0xC2C0
STRING: I pulled her with all my might out of the door.

LABEL: 0xC362
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0xC383
STRING: 「Let's run, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0xC402
STRING: I took her by the hand and ran down the dimly lit hallway.

LABEL: 0xC43E
STRING: There was no sign of Touri coming out of the room.

LABEL: 0xC46E
STRING: Now was our chance to get as far away as we could...

LABEL: 0xC49C
STRING: 「Well done back there.」

LABEL: 0xC52C
STRING: 「I've defeated evil with my Tokki Kick.」

LABEL: 0xC556
STRING: 「I feel rather proud of myself.」

LABEL: 0xC583
STRING: I was shocked that she kicked me, though...

LABEL: 0xC5B3
STRING: However, we managed to get out of that predicament safely because of her.

LABEL: 0xC603
STRING: As I ran, I tried to think.

LABEL: 0xC62D
STRING: Touri had finally appeared as an enemy.

LABEL: 0xC655
STRING: The next time we met, she would surely attack us without a word.

LABEL: 0xC6A9
STRING: What should we do?

LABEL: 0xC6C7
STRING: What should we do going forward?

LABEL: 0xC6F1
STRING: But... I couldn't think of anything.

LABEL: 0xC715
STRING: I couldn't concentrate and think.

LABEL: 0xC739
STRING: The only thing that occupied my thoughts was what I had seen for an instant as I passed Touri just then.

LABEL: 0xC78D
STRING: The thing she was holding in her left hand――

LABEL: 0xC7C1
STRING: What had looked like a blunt weapon was――

LABEL: 0xC7E9
STRING: In reality,

LABEL: 0xC7FA
STRING: Reiri's right arm.
